import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  [Block] klay_getHeaderByHash
</h1>





Returns information about a header by hash. This API works only on RPC call, not on JavaScript console.

**NOTE:** *This API is supported from Klaytn v1.7.0.*

**JSONRPC:** `klay_getHeaderByHash`


## Request

<MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}

      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"method"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"Method name","default":"klay_getHeaderByHash"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"id"}
          required={true}

          qualifierMessage={undefined}

        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"params"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"32-byte DATA[]"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"array","description":"Hash of a block.","example":["0x1b4"],"items":{"type":"string","title":"HashOfBlock","format":"32-byte DATA","description":"Hash of a block."}}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>

                          >

                            >
                              <strong

                                error
                              </strong><span
                                className={"openapi-schema__name"}
                              >
                                 object
                              </span>
                            </span>
                          </summary><div
                            style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                          >
                            <SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"code"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"int64"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","example":-32700,"description":"A Number that indicates the error type that occurred.\nThis MUST be an integer.\n\n| code | message | description |\n|-----|-----|-------|\n| -32700   | Parse error   | invalid JSON was received by the server. An error occurred on the server while parsing the JSON text. |\n|-32602 | Invalid params | Invalid method parameter(s). |\n"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"message"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","example":"Parse error","description":"A String providing a short description of the error.\nThe message SHOULD be limited to a concise single sentence.\n"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"data"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","description":"A Primitive or Structured value that contains additional information about the error.\nThis may be omitted.\nThe value of this member is defined by the Server (e.g. detailed error information, nested errors etc.).\n"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem>
                          </div>
                        </details>
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={true}
                        className={"schemaItem"}
                      >
                        <details
                          style={{}}
                          className={"openapi-markdown__details"}

                            style={{}}

                            <span
                              className={"openapi-schema__container"}
                            >
                              <strong
                                className={"openapi-schema__property"}
                              >
                                result
                              </strong><span

                              >
                                 object
                              </span>
                            </span>
                          </summary><div
                            style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                          >
                            <div
                              style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}
                            >
                              
                              
                              The block header object.
                              
                              
                            </div><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"number"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"hex"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"hex","nullable":true,"description":"The block number. null when its pending block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"hash"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"32-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"32-byte DATA","nullable":true,"description":"Hash of the block. null when it is pending block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"parentHash"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"32-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"32-byte DATA","description":"Hash of the parent block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"logsBloom"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"256-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"256-byte DATA","nullable":true,"description":"The bloom filter for the logs of the block. null when it is pending block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"transactionsRoot"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"32-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"32-byte DATA","description":"The root of the transaction trie of the block"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"stateRoot"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"32-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"32-byte DATA","description":"The root of the final state trie of the block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"receiptsRoot"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"32-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"32-byte DATA","description":"The root of the receipts trie of the block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"reward"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"20-byte DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"20-byte DATA","description":"The address of the beneficiary to whom the block rewards were given."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"blockScore"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"hex"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"hex","description":"Former difficulty. Always 1 in the BFT consensus engine"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"extraData"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"DATA","description":"The \"extra data\" field of this block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"gasUsed"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"hex"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"hex","description":"The total used gas by all transactions in this block."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"timestamp"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"hex"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"hex","description":"The Unix timestamp for when the block was collated."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"timestampFoS"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"hex"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"hex","description":"The fraction of a second of the timestamp for when the block was collated."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"governanceData"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"DATA","description":"RLP encoded governance configuration"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"voteData"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"DATA"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"DATA","description":"RLP encoded governance vote of the proposer"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"baseFeePerGas"}
                              required={true}
                              schemaName={"hex"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","format":"hex","description":"The base fee per gas. It has a meaningful value when EthTxTypeCompatible and Magma hardforks are activated."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem>
                          </div>
                        </details>
                      </SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem><TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}

                    language={"json"}
                  >
